thread.title: Samsung Galaxy S9 Is Impressive and Infuriating

author: David Pierce
title: Samsung Galaxy S9 Is Impressive and Infuriating
text:
Nobody makes better-looking phones than Samsung Electronics. Last year’s Galaxy S8 was a particular gem of a device, glassy and stark with that “infinity display” stretching almost entirely across the front. It was thoughtfully designed on a level only Apple used to be able to achieve. As a result, it flew off shelves.
So why change anything? Nine versions in, Samsung feels it has landed on the right design for its Galaxy S phones. A company spokeswoman compared Samsung’s approach to the way a luxury car maker might build...
